metadata.name: Light Sculpture 40.67°
metadata.description:
Light Sculpture 40.67°
Shinichi Maruyama
JPG, 4200ｘ4200 px, 2017
Edition 1/1

Have You Ever Really Seen a Rainbow? 
As I zoomed in, I realized what was there. 
The sunlight in the water droplet warps, reflects, and disperses, showing us the rainbow.
Ephemeral sculpture series. 
These are all real water shots, not CGI.

This series comes with 112 images, which were shot with different angles of incident light.
